statements: DELETE FROM commercial_property_appraisers WHERE property_id = 101 AND valuation_amount > 500000.00;
DELETE FROM commercial_property_appraisers WHERE valuation_date <= '2022-01-31' AND property_type = 'Retail';
DELETE FROM property_valuations WHERE valuation_id = 100 AND property_id = 50
DELETE FROM property_appraisers WHERE appraiser_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM appraisers WHERE appraiser_name = 'John Doe' AND appraiser_license_no = '12345';
DELETE FROM valuations WHERE valuation_date < '2022-01-01' AND property_value < 100000.00;
DELETE FROM properties WHERE property_name = 'Sample Property';
DELETE FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'House' AND address LIKE '%Street%';
